column2: You press forward to meet the beasts alone.
A large group of armed and armored men set out.
You ignore the wolves from now on.
The child is adopted with full right of inheritance.
Has not adopted the faith of another clan in 10 years\n
All empty demesne counties will get a §YTribal holding§!\n
Howling at the moon all through the night.
Is NOT busy with Feasting, Hunting, Travel or other Special Activities\n
Abandon the county and let one of the neighbors grab it
You surrender and submit yourself to the mercy of [From.GetTitledName]. [From.GetSheHeCap] may or may not spare your life...\n
Has been leading the company for five years\n
Due to population, additional provinces may be converted to §Y[From.Culture.GetName]§! culture and the §Y[From.Religion.GetName]§! faith.\n
